short_summary: Diving services for Rideau Canal Waterway
description: The contractor will provide diving services and dive supervision for test excavation and construction in the Rideau Canal, with possibility of exhibitions and events in the summer months.  The awarded firm shall provide a crew of three or four individuals with the appropriate skill level to lead the dive team for the purpose of facilitating excavation in the dredged areas as well as support for ongoing capital work during the. Integrated capital contract and test excavation work rehab Project to allow for ongoing dredging operations at Sorel Island for all roads and trails that connect through Out Canada.  Park explaination activity
full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer: Diving Services for Rideau Canal National Historic Site

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer

**Notice ID:** PW-23-01024654/1
**Publication Date:** February 6, 2023
**Closing Date:** March 13, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
**Location:** Rideau Canal National Historic Site, ON

**Background:**

Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to provide diving services and dive supervision for the Rideau Canal National Historic Site. The services are required for investigation, operation, and construction activities within the site.

**Scope:**

* Diving services and dive supervision
* Estimated quantity of services: as required
* Duration: April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2027
* Time frame of delivery: April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2027

**Offer Evaluation:**

* Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest evaluated price.
* The offer will be ranked and selected based on the evaluation criteria.

**Standards and Regulations:**

* National Parks Regulations must be adhered to in the performance of work.
* The winning bidder must comply with all relevant laws, rules, and regulations.

**Additional Requirements:**

* The bidder must include the following requirements in the bid:
	+ Estimated quantity of commodity
	+ Duration of contract
	+ Time frame of delivery
	+ Any conditions for participation of suppliers not specified in solicitation documentation
* Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official.
* Bidders must submit their bids via fax or email; in-person or courier submissions will not be accepted.

**Inquires and Contact:**

* Technical and contractual inquiries must be submitted to the Contracting Authority.
* Contact information:
	+ Julie Dicaire
	+ julie.dicaire@pc.gc.ca
	+ 1-877-558-2349

**Do Not Submit:**

* Do not submit bids directly to the Contracting Authority or any email address other than julie.dicaire@pc.gc.ca.
* Do not submit bids with links to documents; attachments only will be accepted.

**Attachment:**

* A copy of the request for standing offer document and all amendments may be obtained from Canada's Tendering Service Portal at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities. I temla20 bought
